name: Build a Full-Stack Application
description: Build a complete full-stack application with frontend, backend API, database, and deployment pipeline

steps.name: Requirements & User Stories
steps.description: Gather detailed requirements. Define user stories, acceptance criteria, and scope boundaries. Identify the target audience, key features, and MVP scope.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Requirements document with user stories, feature list, and clear MVP definition

steps.name: Architecture & Tech Stack
steps.description: Choose the technology stack (frontend framework, backend language, database, hosting). Design the system architecture: component diagram, data flow, API contracts between frontend and backend.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Architecture document with tech stack decisions, component diagram, and API contract definitions

steps.name: Database Design & Setup
steps.description: Design the database schema with tables, relationships, indexes, and constraints. Create migration files and seed data for development.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Database schema created, migrations run cleanly, seed data populates correctly

steps.name: Backend API Implementation
steps.description: Build the backend API: routes, controllers, services, data access layer, authentication, input validation, and error handling. Follow REST or GraphQL conventions.
steps.acceptance_criteria: All API endpoints working, authentication in place, proper error responses for all edge cases

steps.name: Frontend Scaffolding & Routing
steps.description: Set up the frontend project with chosen framework. Configure routing, layout components, state management, and API client integration.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Frontend app runs, routing works, API client configured to talk to backend

steps.name: Frontend UI Implementation
steps.description: Build all UI pages and components: forms, lists, detail views, navigation, loading states, and error states. Implement responsive design.
steps.acceptance_criteria: All pages built, forms submit correctly, data displays properly, responsive on mobile and desktop

steps.name: Frontend-Backend Integration
steps.description: Connect all frontend components to backend API endpoints. Implement authentication flow (login/logout/register), data fetching, and real-time updates if needed.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Full data flow working end-to-end, auth flow complete, all CRUD operations functional through the UI

steps.name: Testing Suite
steps.description: Write backend unit/integration tests, frontend component tests, and end-to-end tests for critical user flows. Set up test infrastructure and CI test running.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Backend tests >80% coverage, frontend key components tested, E2E tests for login and main user flow pass

steps.name: Polish & Error Handling
steps.description: Add loading indicators, error boundaries, toast notifications, form validation messages, empty states, and 404 pages. Ensure graceful degradation.
steps.acceptance_criteria: No unhandled errors visible to user, all edge states have proper UI, loading states everywhere

steps.name: Deployment & DevOps
steps.description: Create Docker configuration, CI/CD pipeline, environment variable management, production database setup, and monitoring. Deploy to staging environment.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Application deployed to staging, CI/CD pipeline green, monitoring configured, README updated with deploy instructions
